unnormalised: The disruption caused by the delayed Air India flight AI301 from Delhi to London Heathrow on 22/10/2024 rippled through travel plans for hundreds. The initial scheduled departure was 07:30 AM IST, but due to unforeseen technical difficulties, passengers were left waiting at Indira Gandhi International Airport for nearly 8 hrs. Passengers traveling onwards to the US West Coast were especially concerned, given the significant time difference.
normalised: The disruption caused by the delayed Air India flight A-I three hundred and one from Delhi to London Heathrow on twenty second October two thousand and twenty four rippled through travel plans for hundreds. The initial scheduled departure was seven thirty A-M I-S-T, but due to unforeseen technical difficulties, passengers were left waiting at Indira Gandhi International Airport for nearly eight hours. Passengers traveling onwards to the U-S West Coast were especially concerned, given the significant time difference.

unnormalised: Many passengers missed their connecting flights, leading to a scramble to rebook and adjust itineraries. For instance, Mr. Sharma, heading to San Francisco for a crucial business meeting, faced the daunting task of rescheduling across time zones. SFO is approximately 12.5 hrs behind India during standard time (IST), making it challenging to communicate and coordinate in real time. The airline staff were working overtime to re-accommodate passengers, but the complexity of international flight schedules, coupled with varying time zone differences, added to the logistical nightmare.
